entry.title: girl in red - October Passed Me By (live performance video feat. Aaron Dessner)

media:group.media:title: girl in red - October Passed Me By (live performance video feat. Aaron Dessner)
media:group.media:description:
Official Live Performance Video for ‚ÄúOctober Passed Me By‚Äù by girl in red
Listen & Download ‚ÄúOctober Passed Me By‚Äù out now: https://girlinred.lnk.to/octoberpasse...
Filmed by Isak Jenssen
Amazon Music: https://girlinred.lnk.to/octoberpasse... Apple Music: https://girlinred.lnk.to/octoberpasse... iTunes: https://girlinred.lnk.to/octoberpasse... Pandora: https://girlinred.lnk.to/octoberpasse... Soundcloud: https://girlinred.lnk.to/octoberpasse... Spotify: https://girlinred.lnk.to/octoberpasse... YouTube Music: https://girlinred.lnk.to/octoberpasse... YouTube: https://girlinred.lnk.to/octoberpasse...
Follow girl in red Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/girlinred Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/girlinred TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@girlinred Twitter: https://twitter.com/_girlinred_ Website: https://worldinred.com/
Lyrics: i keep the letters that you wrote in a secret place everynow and then i go down memory lane october passed me by just like any month but i still think of the times you took the breath out of my lungs
i got bitter when you got cold could you really blame me though cause i‚Äôm still tied up when you go you know this song is about you who else could it be you were the first to make me feel like i was me
it wasn‚Äôt all good it wasn‚Äôt all pretty lost our grip while tryna go steady holding on to you like maybe one day we‚Äôll meet
i met you at the wrong time didn‚Äôt wanna see i was looking at the stars you were looking at me for better or for worse i don‚Äôt know but for what its worth i made you my whole world i made you my whole world
screaming at the top of my lungs ! i love you my girl ! always in the back in the mind you‚Äôll be my girl
#girlinred #OctoberPassedMeBy

Hunter Schafer directs ‚ÄúHORNYLOVESICKMESS‚Äù for girl in red

Lyrics!!!
I‚Äôm in New York thinking of you Wondering what you are up to From this lonely ass hotel room With a pretty good looking view
I am somewhere in the states Going somewhere on a plane It doesn‚Äôt really matter as long as I‚Äôm Always far away
Or maybe on a bus for months straight Shit‚Äôs fun but I‚Äôm going insane Like it‚Äôs been months since I‚Äôve had sex I‚Äôm just a horny little lovesick mess
And I don‚Äôt wanna be the type of person who calls you up Every time I need to get off But I guess that‚Äôs who I‚Äôm turning into Oh fuck
Down at Times Square in the rain There‚Äôs a billboard with my face It‚Äôs so weird how things have changed Think about it everyday
If I ever make it back Will I find what we once had? Guess I ruined us pretty bad
I‚Äôm in the same city as you But I still don‚Äôt come through ‚ÄòCause I‚Äôve got so much to do And that‚Äôs the shittiest excuse
So don‚Äôt ever take me back Let‚Äôs just face the fact I treated you like trash And you deserve more than that
#girlinred #hornylovesickmess #ificouldmakeitgoquiet
